reviews.review: We saw this as a joke and it was.

The Emoji Movie is a typical kids movie with adult jokes about the setting and a decent, relevant moral that gets far more hate than it deserves due to a few questionable writing bits and the main characters being emojis.

well, not what I expected. It felt like watching an ad in a feature film length.
And the screenplay is very purely written in a very cliche way. Not what you expect from an animation movie.
This movie is bad. There I just said it. It has such a bad story. I feel like this movie had no point to it. More people hate it than like it. Gene has basically no character development
One in a million animated crap movies, has some funny moments though. Suitable for children from the 5th year on.
So good I didn't even watch it.
This film was decent, but it slacked.

this movie FAILED first of all it is insulting towards children and adults alike and the jokes are weak as water you may also say the lines were done by monkeys that is dumber than a rock                                                 
 


                                                     !Notice!
                                         HAPPY NEW YEAR

Because of the harsh reviews I was expecting to be disgusted and turn it off early but I actually thought it was good. I always use emojis in most of my texts so I was happy to see that this wasn't a piece of garbage. The one smiley girl was really annoying but other than that a good movie overall

I was on my way to the cinema to see this with my friend Jorja, and I didn't expect to like it, but it turned out to be really good film.
Not exactly one of the funniest films of all time, but still, I like the story, the characters, the occasional childish jokes and the occasional funny moments - and I enjoy hearing James Corden as Hi-5 and Patrick Stewart as Poop.
So what I'm saying is that it's not really a movie that deserves a comedy award, but it's great for those who like emojis on their phones.
